languages.text: Во время одного из варп-перелетов по необъяснимым причинам ведьма вырвала из себя усмирявшее ее силы ксеноустройство, взвыла хором нечеловеческих голосов и обратилась в подобие двери из костей и мяса. По команде еще живого лица псайкера, вплавившегося в дверь, та распахнулась и стала порталом в Имматериум, из которого хлынул поток олицетворенного ужаса. Данные о том, что именно скрывалось за дверью и как оно было уничтожено, были изъяты Инквизицией. Погибло несколько сотен членов экипажа прежде, чем Лорд-капитан лично уничтожил{mf||а} портал.
languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира НЕДОБРОВОЛЬНО носит псидампер

languages.text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.
languages.original_text: Во время одного из варп-перелетов по необъяснимым причинам ведьма вырвала из себя усмирявшее ее силы ксеноустройство, взвыла хором нечеловеческих голосов и обратилась в подобие двери из костей и мяса. По команде еще живого лица псайкера, вплавившегося в дверь, та распахнулась и стала порталом в Имматериум, из которого хлынул поток олицетворенного ужаса. Данные о том, что именно скрывалось за дверью и как оно было уничтожено, были изъяты Инквизицией. Погибло несколько сотен членов экипажа прежде, чем Лорд-капитан лично уничтожил{mf||а} портал.

traits.locale_text: During one of the warp jumps, the Wych, for an unknown reason, ripped the xenodevice out of herself, howled in a choir of inhuman voices and turned into something alike a door of bones and meat. On a command of the psyker's face, still alive and merged with the door, it opened and became a portal into Immaterium, that erupted a stream of personified horror. All data referring to what was behind that door and with what means it was destroyed, was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundreds of crewmen died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal {mf|him|her}self.

During one of the warp jumps, the Wych, for an unknown reason, ripped the xenodevice out of herself, howled in a choir of inhuman voices and turned into something alike a door of bones and meat. On a command of the psyker's face, still alive and merged with the door, it opened and became a portal into Immaterium, that erupted a stream of personified horror. All data referring to what was behind that door and with what means it was destroyed, was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundreds of crewmen died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal {mf|him|her}self.

During a warp jump, the Wych suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened and erupted as a portal into the Immaterium with a burst of personified horror. Any data regarding what was behind that door and how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crewmen died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal {mf|him|her}self.

Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened and erupted as a portal into the Immaterium with a burst of personified horror. Any data regarding what was behind that door and how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crewmen died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal {mf|him|her}self.

During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

languages.text: 在某次亚空间跳跃中，伊迪拉突然扯掉了抑制力量的异形装置，发出非人的嚎叫，随后就变成了一扇宛如血肉与白骨制成的大门。然而，这样的转变并没有夺走她的性命，反而让她打开了一条通道，来自另一个世界的恐怖之物从这扇通往亚空间的门户中不断涌出。没人知道那扇门后面究竟藏着什么，也没人知道这扇门是如何摧毁的，关于这场事故的所有资料都被审判庭没收了。唯一能知道的是，这扇传送门杀死了几百名船员，直到领主舰长亲自将其摧毁。
languages.original_text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

traits.locale_text: 在某次亚空间跳跃中，伊迪拉突然扯掉了抑制力量的异形装置，发出非人的嚎叫，随后就变成了一扇宛如血肉与白骨制成的大门。然而，这样的转变并没有夺走她的性命，反而让她打开了一条通道，来自另一个世界的恐怖之物从这扇通往亚空间的门户中不断涌出。没人知道那扇门后面究竟藏着什么，也没人知道这扇门是如何摧毁的，关于这场事故的所有资料都被审判庭没收了。唯一能知道的是，这扇传送门杀死了几百名船员，直到领主舰长亲自将其摧毁。

languages.text: Während eines Warpsprungs riss die Hexe sich plötzlich das Xeno-Gerät heraus, das ihre Kräfte dämpfte, heulte in einem Chor unmenschlicher Stimmen auf und verwandelte sich in eine Art Tür aus Fleisch und Knochen. Die Psionikerin war in ihrer neuen Manifestation weiterhin am Leben. Sie befahl das Öffnen einer Passage und verwandelte sich durch eine fleischgewordene Explosion des Grauens in ein Portal zum Immaterium. Sämtliche Daten darüber, was hinter dieser Tür lag und wie sie zerstört wurde, wurden von der Inquisition zur Verschlusssache erklärt. Mehrere hundert Crewmitglieder sind gestorben, bevor der Lord Captain persönlich das Portal zerstörte.
languages.original_text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

traits.locale_text: Während deines Warpsprungs riss die Hekatari sich plötzlich das Xeno-Gerät heraus, das ihre Kräfte dämpfte, heulte in einem Chor unmenschlicher Stimmen auf und verwandelte sich in eine Art Tür aus Fleisch und Knochen. Die Psionikerin war in ihrer neuen Manifestation weiterhin am Leben. Sie befahl das Öffnen einer Passage und verwandelte sich in ein entsetzliches Portal zum Immaterium. Sämtliche Daten darüber, was hinter dieser Tür lag und wie sie zerstört wurde, wurden von der Inquisition zur Verschlusssache erklärt. Mehrere hundert Crewmitglieder sind gestorben, bevor der Lord Captain persönlich das Portal zerstörte.

languages.text: Au cours d'un saut Warp, la Céraste arracha brusquement le dispositif xénos qui bridait ses pouvoirs et laissa s'échapper de sa gorge un chœur de voix non-humaines, avant de se transformer en une porte faite de chair et d'os. Toujours vivante sous sa nouvelle forme, la psyker ordonna l'ouverture d'un passage et se changea en portail cauchemardesque vers l'Immaterium tout de chair et d'horreur. L'Inquisition mit sous scellés toutes les données concernant ce qui se trouvait derrière cette porte ou sur la façon dont elle fut détruite, et plusieurs centaines de membres d'équipage périrent avant que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne parvienne à détruire le portail.
languages.original_text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

traits.locale_text: Au cours d'un saut Warp, la Céraste arracha brusquement le dispositif xéno qui bridait ses pouvoirs et laissa s'échapper de sa gorge un chœur de voix inhumaines, avant de se transformer en une porte faite de chair et d'os. Toujours vivante sous sa nouvelle forme, la psyker ordonna l'ouverture d'un passage et se changea en portail cauchemardesque vers l'Immaterium. L'Inquisition mit sous scellés toutes les données concernant ce qui se trouvait derrière cette porte et sur la façon dont elle fut détruite, et plusieurs centaines de membres d'équipage périrent avant que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne parvienne à se débarrasser de ce portail.

languages.text: Durante un salto de disformidad, la bruja se arrancó sin previo aviso el dispositivo xenos que controlaba su poder, aulló en un coro de voces inhumanas y se transformó en algo similar a una puerta de carne y hueso. Aún con vida en su nueva manifestación, la psíquica ordenó la apertura de un pasaje y estalló en un portal del Inmaterio con una explosión de terror hecho carne. Todos los datos respecto a lo que había detrás de la puerta y cómo se destruyó quedaron confiscados por la Inquisición. Cientos de tripulantes murieron antes de que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pudiera destruir el portal personalmente.
languages.original_text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

traits.locale_text: Durante un salto de disformidad, la bruja se arrancó sin previo aviso el dispositivo xenos que controlaba su poder, aulló en un coro de voces inhumanas y se transformó en algo similar a una puerta de carne y hueso. Aún con vida en su nueva manifestación, la psíquica ordenó la apertura de un pasaje y estalló en un portal del Inmaterio con una explosión de auténtico terror. Todos los datos respecto a lo que había detrás de la puerta y cómo se destruyó quedaron confiscados por la Inquisición. Cientos de tripulantes murieron antes de que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pudiera destruir el portal personalmente.

languages.text: ワープジャンプのさなか、ウィッチは自身の力を弱めていた異種族デバイスをにわかに引き剥がし、人ならぬ声の数々に喚声を響かせながら、肉と骨から成る扉のような物に姿を変えた。この姿にあってもなお生命を保つ異能者が宣じることには、道は開かれ、非物質世界へのポータルが出現し、恐怖の化身が奔流となって現れたという。扉の向こうに存在していたものと扉の破壊方法については、一切のデータが異端審問庁により没収されている。ロード・キャプテンがその手でポータルを壊すまでの間に、数百名の乗員が命を落とした。
languages.original_text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

traits.locale_text: ワープジャンプのさなか、ウィッチは自身の力を弱めていたゼノデバイスをにわかに引き剥がし、人ならぬ声の数々に喚声を響かせながら、肉と骨から成る扉のような物に姿を変えた。この姿にあってもなお生命を保つ異能者が宣じることには、道は開かれ、非物質世界へのポータルが出現し、恐怖の化身が奔流となって現れたという。扉の向こうに存在していたものと扉の破壊方法については、一切のデータが異端審問庁により没収されている。ロード・キャプテンがその手でポータルを壊すまでの間に、数百名の乗員が命を落とした。

languages.text: Bir öte sıçrama sırasında cadı; güçlerini körelten zeno cihazını aniden söktü, birtakım insan dışı sesler çıkardı ve etten, kemikten yapılma bir kapıya benzeyen bir mahluka dönüştü. Yeni biçiminde hayatını devam ettiren ruhsezer; bir geçidin açılması emrini verdi, alev aldı ve etten bir dehşet patlaması ile Tindiyar'a açılan bir portala dönüştü. Engizisyon, kapının arkasında ne olduğu veya nasıl yok edildiğine dair bilgilere el koydu. Lord Kaptan, birkaç yüz tayfanın can verdiği elim olaya son noktayı koyarak portalı ortadan kaldırdı.
languages.original_text: During a warp jump, the witch suddenly ripped out the xenodevice that dampened her power, howled in a choir of inhuman voices, and turned into something resembling a door made of flesh and bone. Still alive in her new manifestation, the psyker commanded that a passage be opened, erupting and becoming a portal to the Immaterium in a burst of horror made flesh. Any data regarding what was behind that door or how it was destroyed was confiscated by the Inquisition. Several hundred crew members died before the Lord Captain destroyed the portal.

traits.locale_text: Cadı, bir öte sıçrama sırasında, güçlerini körelten zeno cihazı aniden söktü, insan dışı seslerden oluşan bir grup sesler çıkardı ve etten ve kemikten yapılma bir kapıya benzeyen bir şeye dönüştü. Bu dönüştüğü yeni şekilde hâlâ hayatta olan ruhsezer, bir geçidin açılması emrini verdi, alev aldı ve etten yapılma bir dehşet patlaması ile Tindiyar'a açılan bir portal hâline geldi. Kapının arkasında ne olduğu veya nasıl yok edildiği bilgisine Engizisyon'ca el kondu. Lord Kaptan portalı yok etmeden önce birkaç yüz tayfa ölmüştü.

languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира НЕДОБРОВОЛЬНО носит псидампер
